instruction: Summarize a recent major news event in 5 sentences.
output: Recently, the world has seen the COVID-19 vaccine rollouts around the globe. It has become an urgent issue as it is considered a necessary step towards recovery from the pandemic. Pharmaceutical companies have been working hard to develop a vaccine that is safe and effective against the virus. Several countries have already started to provide immunity to their citizens, with more expected to follow suit. While there is optimism about the speed of the vaccine rollout, there are still uncertainties regarding its efficacy and the distribution process.
